title: Cafetto Inverso
description: A unique blend of ingredients that targets and removes dried on milk residues from pitchers, jugs and steam wands. Also a brilliant crockery restorer, cleaning and destaining heavy soiling. Available in 750g jars only

title: Cafetto Barista Cloth Set
description: Premium quality microfibre cloths designed to assist the barista in maintaining complete cleanliness of the espresso machine and its surrounds. Premium microfibre cloths designed to outperform and outlast the conventional kitchen cleaning cloths. Cloth fibres loosen and lift more dust, dirt and liquid. Cloth Set includes: 1 x Brown Barista Clip Cloth 30x60cm 1 x Green Cleaning Cloth 30x30cm 2 x Blue Cleaning Cloths 20x20cm

title: Rhino Waste Tube
description: Rhinowares home user waste tube is here! It's the perfect size for domestic use, measuring 135mm wide by 150mm high. The Rhinowares knock tube also boasts the following features: Great capacity for entertaining, or just a busy household Safe for dishwasher (remove rubber rod first) Rubber base made to stay put Durable rubber bar is easy to remove for cleaning or replacement

title: Hario Buono Kettle 1.2L
description: This practical kettle is an essential tool for every barista - you can use it to boil and pour water. Thanks to its precision, it is particularly useful for coffee brewing with alternative methods such as a Dripper, Chemex or Aeropress. Its slim profiled spout allows for full control of pouring, so you have an influence on the pace and direction of the water stream. Product Specifications - Material: Stainless Steel Not suitable for use in a microwave Suitable for gas, electric, induction and halogen stoves Made in Japan

title: Cafetto EVO Espresso Machine Cleaner
description: Evo® is a safe, high performance and organic certified espresso machine cleaning powder. This food grade cleaner comes with a completely soluble and free-rinsing formulation that allows easy cleaning and leaving no trace of odour in your espresso machine. The premium cleaner for professional espresso machines using organic coffee. Cafetto EVO is OMRI listed as complying with the USDA National Organic Program requirements and BFA registered as complying with the requirements of the Australian Organic Standard. With its rapidly soluble and free-rinsing formulation, EVO ® removes coffee oils, grounds and stains, improving the taste and aroma of espresso. Ingredients are rapidly biodegradable and odourless. Non-GMO and free from phosphates and chlorine. Non-corrosive formulation to protect the machine. A measuring scoop is included in 1kg and 500g jars for accurate dosing.

The six cup Chemex brewer can comfortably brew up to 400ml of coffee.

title: Rhino Shot Glass - Double Spout
description: Rhinowares has answered the call for a double-spouted shot glass that combines durability and functionality. This 80ml (3 ounce) handled shot glass is perfect for pulling double shots. The handle protects fingers from the heat of a freshly dropped shot. Graduated measurement marks make it so easy to get the shot right. Also available for a single shot version.

title: Hario Mini Mill Slim +
description: Enjoy the taste of freshly ground coffee at home any time! Ceramic mortar has no odor, does not rust. The coarse powder is adjustable simply by turning the knob; also, you can calibrate the amount of ground through the transparent bottle. When not in use, you can store the grinder without the handle. Secure design makes for easier grinding. Easy to clean with disassembled parts, Slim design saves space.

title: Baratza Sette 270
description: Can't wait to use your grinder? Get a complimentary 250g bag of beans (worth S$23) with purchase of a Baratza Sette 270!* The Sette 270 sets the standard for high performance home espresso grinders. Offering 30 responsive macro-adjustments plus 9 marked settings of stepless micro-adjustment to let you dial in your shots time after time. These are directly connected the ground-breaking Sette series gearbox technology to provide near zero retention and a quick-accessible cleaning and maintenance process. The front mounted control panel with backlit LED display is user-friendly. Easy programmable buttons allow for grind time settings within 0.01 second and you can save up to 3 different dose preferences. The grind quality on the Sette 270 covers a wide breadth of styles and with the convenient convertible device you can go from grinding into your portafilter to grinding into the included anti-static bin or most of the popular single-cup brewing methods. Speed To Grind Espresso 3.5g/sec—Ma

title: Hario Mizudashi Cold Brew Coffee Pot 600ml
description: Hario has been dedicated to the design, production, and sale of heatproof glass since it was founded in 1921 and is the only heatproof glass manufacturer in Japan to have a factory. The simplicity is what makes this coffee brewer better than the next. All you have to do is dose your favourite coffee grinds and then top it off with water. Stir it for a bit until all the grounds have been soaked. Place it in your refrigerator overnight (~8hours) and enjoy the full-bodied, rich taste of cold brewed coffee. Watch our tutorial here! Made in Japan.

title: Brewista Smart Scale II
description: The Brewista Smart Scale II is water resistant thanks to its completely sealed body and water repellent nano-coating. It automatically tares, automatically times, and automatically shuts off depending upon which of the six available modes has been selected by the user. Perfect for pour over or espresso preparation.

title: Hario V60 Paper Filters - 01
description: Conical shaped paper filters fitted for the Hario V60 01 dripper. Paper filters ensures your coffee remain clean yet flavourful. Each packet contains 100 pieces.

title: Rhino S/S Professional Milk Pitcher
description: The Rhinowares Professional Milk Pitcher speaks to those in the coffee industry: people who have a need for a quality product with less waste. Features of this small sized pitcher include: Measurements etched right into the interior of both sides of the pitcher The scale is etched in both ounces and millilitres to reduce the guess work when pouring milk. Reducing the waste means dollars saved for your cafe. The Rhinowares pitchers are 1mm thick Food grade stainless steel provides better stretch time for texturing milk. Available in 360ml, 600ml and 950ml.

title: Able Travel Cap
description: The Aeropress is the perfect portable brewing device, and the Able Travel Cap emphasises this by allowing you to take full advantage of the space in the plunger to pack your brewing needs all in one neat package. The Able Travel Cap also provides a good grip when plunging, or a non-slip surface when using the inverted method.

title: Pesado Naked Portafilter
description: The PESADO coffee machine Portafilter has been designed to optimise efficiency and durability. The body is made entirely of stainless steel to increase strength and performance with heavy usage. The "naked" head exposes the bottom of your basket, allowing you to diagnose any channeling or issues with your shot. When you get the perfect extraction, you will see the true beauty forming before your eyes. This portafilter does not need to be soaked in chemicals. The stainless steel body means a simple soft wash in warm soapy water at the end of the day will keep your portafilter fresh and clean. All of our Wenge and Zebrano handles are made on a hand lathe, both ethically sourced exotic woods that are of the highest durability, smoothly finished in natural wax with perfect ergonomic shape. Suitable for: LaMarzocco, Synesso, Slayer, E61, Wega, KVW.

title: Pesado Basket (IMS)
description: PESADO has worked closely with IMS to create a basket with a strong focus on precision and consistency. When used with the PESADO 58.5 Tamper, this basket extracts flawlessly with even and unrestricted flow. The difference: PESADO baskets have an increased number of funnel shaped holes covering the extraction surface right to the edge. These baskets are finished with electro-polishing, reducing friction and ensuring the smoothest finish possible. This combination of features maximises extraction flow, and reduces variation.

title: AeroPress Coffee Maker
description: Fast and convenient, the AeroPress Coffee and Espresso Maker makes one of the best cups of coffee you'll ever taste. This innovation uses the ideal water temperature and gentle air pressure brewing to produce coffee and espresso that has rich flavor with lower acidity and without bitterness. Items included in the box: Aerobie Aeropress Filter Cap Stirrer Coffee Scoop

title: PPP Coffee Limited Edition Mug
description: Introducing our Limited edition Mug, s pecially illustrated by @ jeremythesnork. Designed in Singapore. Made in Japan.

title: Baratza Sette 30
description: Can't wait to use your grinder? Get a complimentary 250g bag of coffee beans (worth S$23) with purchase of a Baratza Sette 30!* The starter model of the multipurpose Sette series lineup and an immediate upgrade for your espresso game. With the totally redesigned gearbox and burr set in which the outer ring burr rotates around a stationary cone burr, you’ll experience high-speed grinding and almost zero retention. A front mounted backlit LED display makes the Sette 30 simple and easy to use. The intuitive start/stop button will set off your coffee-making experience to a new level by precisely dosing just the coffee you need for each brew. Fine-tune your grind with 30 settings on the burr adjustment ring. Your prep work is a breeze with the convertible device holder that lets you grind directly into a portafilter or switch to grind into a static-reducing grounds bin. You may also find some single-cup brewing methods to fit just right and maximize your routine. Speed To Grind Espresso 3.5

title: Pesado Competition Shower Screen
description: The brand new PESADO Shower for E61 machines and La Marzocco and Synesso machines. The INTEGRATED MEMBRANE SHOWER SCREEN designed by I.M.S. and 100% made in Italy, consists of a special membrane built inside the supporting body of the shower and has a filtering capacity of 200 μM. Individually laser cut, the narrow holes of these showers slow water flow and avoid build up of residue behind the screen. Manufacturing these as a single piece strengthens the body and smoothes the surface, resulting in a long lasting and consistent shower. The Difference: Standard showers and baskets are "pressed" resulting in a pyramid shaped hole. On these showers, the cone shaped internal surface of the holes does not present any sharp corners or friction thus allowing ease of liquid flow. The quartz coating will improve the water flow, make the cleaning process of the shower a simple wipe and increase extraction consistency.

title: Ryan Brown Dear Coffee Buyer: A Guide to Sourcing Green Coffee
description: Dear Coffee Buyer by Ryan Brown is the first ever book dedicated to the profession of green coffee buying. Brown's vivid descriptions and engaging prose make readers feel like they’re right there with him: tagging along to taste hundreds of coffee samples during a twenty-hour stop in Guatemala, feeling his nervous excitement when he takes a spontaneous buying trip to Honduras with little more than a backpack, and sharing his frustration and determination to find farmers and exporters willing to offer exceptional coffees. Along the way, Brown takes an in-depth look at coffee bean varieties, processing, origins, cupping, forecasting, and pricing. He even interviews other legendary coffee buyers to get their take on the skills needed to begin a successful career in coffee buying. Dear Coffee Buyer will change the way a generation of baristas, roasters, and green buyers views 'direct trade,' seasonality, the Geisha variety, and the complex challenges of getting beans halfway around the wor

title: Hario V60 02 Coloured Ceramic Drippers
description: The Hario V60 coffee dripper is one of the most classic coffee brewing equipment. Conical shaped with inner spiral ribs, the V60 dripper is the dripper to go for to achieve a simple and delicious cup that can enhance the complexity of a coffee. Watch our video tutorial on how easy it is! Designed and manufactured by Hario Asia exclusively for PPP Coffee in Singapore.

title: Chemex Bonded Filters Unfolded Half Moon
description: The Chemex® coffeemaker, together with Chemex-Bonded® Coffee Filter, makes perfect coffee. Clear, pure, flavorful and without bitterness or sediment every time. The Chemex paper filters are made of specialty fibre filter and also 20% - 30% thicker than other filters. These keeps the bitter elements, oils, and grounds out of your cup, resulting in a flavourful yet clean cup! Each box contains 100 pieces of filters.

title: Hario V60 02 Coloured Ceramic Drippers
description: The Hario V60 coffee dripper is one of the most classic coffee brewing equipment. Conical shaped with inner spiral ribs, the V60 dripper is the dripper to go for to achieve a simple and delicious cup that can enhance the complexity of a coffee. Watch our video tutorial on how easy it is! Designed and manufactured by Hario Asia exclusively for PPP Coffee in Singapore.

title: Clever Dripper
description: The Clever Coffee Dripper differs from other "pour over" methods, or percolators. As a full-immersion brewing device, it also helps you to recreate the same cup consistently every time! You can adjust one variable at a time (water temperature, amount of grounds, time in brewer) to yield the perfect brew. All you need is a coffee cup, flat bottom cone-shaped paper filters, and some freshly ground coffee. The Clever Dripper S holds a volume of up to 250ml, while the Clever Dripper L brews up to 590ml

title: Rhino Tamper - Black
description: The Rhino Coffee Gear Professional Tamper range has been designed with both the professional & home barista in mind. With the ergonomically designed anodised aluminium handle & professionally weighted 304 stainless steel base they weigh in at approx. 500g, are comfortable to use and very durable. Fitted for 58mm portafilters

title: Supernova Pods - Fusion
description: Cafe-style coffee redesigned for the everyday drinker in Nespresso-compatible pods. Supernova was born out of an obsession and a dedication to make high quality coffees more accessible to the everyday coffee drinker. Wherever you might be, you can always enjoy a delicious tasting cup, with our high quality Nespresso-compatible pods. Now available in 100% aluminium. Reminding us of a warm chocolate loaf topped with a generous blend of nuts, Fusion is perfect for the morning, or any time of the day, with milk or on its own. Current Composition: Brazil Rio Brilhante, India Thippanahalli Expect To Taste: Roasted Nuts, Caramel, Dark Chocolate *Please note that coffee beans used in composition may change or vary depending on availability. Please refer to the product page for the most up to date coffee.

title: Surprise Box Coffee Subscription
description: Get the season's latest filter coffees delivered to your doorstep every month, + a little something extra. The Surprise Box is our way of elevating the home brewer's experience through a curated line-up of coffees that we have sourced from coffee producers around the world. As a subscriber, you can look forward to receiving a bag of seasonal premium filter coffee every month. 1-Bag - subscriber will receive a bag of seasonal premium filter 2-Bags - subscribers will receive a bag of seasonal premium filter coffee, and a bag of from our regular selection. In addition to that, expect a little something extra in each order alongside the coffee. Something complimentary from us to you to complement your drinking experience. We hope you'll like it! Subscribe before 25th to hop on the next month's Surprise Box. All orders will be shipped out by the 5th of every month. Questions? Look for answers here!

As a subscriber, you can look forward to receiving a bag of seasonal premium filter coffee every month. 1-Bag - subscriber will receive a bag of seasonal premium filter 2-Bags - subscribers will receive a bag of seasonal premium filter coffee, and a bag of from our regular selection. In addition to that, expect a little something extra in each order alongside the coffee. Something complimentary from us to you to complement your drinking experience. We hope you'll like it! Subscribe before 25th to hop on the next month's Surprise Box. All orders will be shipped out by the 5th of every month. Questions? Look for answers here!

title: PPP Coffee Enamel Pin - Chye Seng Huat Hardware
description: Pin them on your apron, your favourite cap, your plain Tees! Show everyone your love for coffee!

title: Supernova Pods - Ethiopia
description: Cafe-style coffee redesigned for the everyday drinker in Nespresso-compatible pods. Supernova was born out of an obsession and a dedication to make high quality coffees more accessible to the everyday coffee drinker. Wherever you might be, you can always enjoy a delicious tasting cup, with our high quality Nespresso-compatible pods. Now available in 100% aluminium. If you're looking for a coffee that has fruity and floral notes with bright and pleasant acidity, Ethiopia is for you. Best enjoyed black. Current Offering: Ethiopia Suke Quto Origin : Guji, Ethiopia Varietal : Kurume & Welicho Processing : Fully-Washed Altitude : 1850 - 2200 m.a.s.l. Expect to Taste : Peach, Earl Grey Tea, Citrus *Please note that coffee offering may change or vary depending on availability. Please refer to the product page for the most up to date .

title: Supernova Pods - Variety Pack
description: Here at PPP Coffee, we believe that every coffee has a story. The Supernova Discovery Box is our way of sharing some of these stories from Latin America, Africa and Asia, with everyday drinkers like you, through high-quality and environmentally-friendly, Nespresso-compatible pods. Each box set includes 40 pcs of Nespresso-compatible pods: Fusion Ethiopia India Decaf Find out more about our Supernova range of pods here.

title: Rhino Stealth Milk Pitcher - Black
description: The Rhino Stealth Milk Pitcher range has been developed by people who understand the needs of the specialty coffee industry. The Stealth Milk Pitchers features the following; Premium Non-Stick Coating With a non-stick and food safe double coating, this milk jug is durable and very easy to keep clean. Stainless Steel Body A 1mm thick food grade stainless steel body provides a longer stretch time for texturing milk. This thicker grade steel also provides a great weight and professional feel. Professional Spout Designed for smooth pouring and latte art.

title: Rhino Stealth Milk Pitcher - Black
description: The Rhino Stealth Milk Pitcher range has been developed by people who understand the needs of the specialty coffee industry. The Stealth Milk Pitchers features the following; Premium Non-Stick Coating With a non-stick and food safe double coating, this milk jug is durable and very easy to keep clean. Stainless Steel Body A 1mm thick food grade stainless steel body provides a longer stretch time for texturing milk. This thicker grade steel also provides a great weight and professional feel. Professional Spout Designed for smooth pouring and latte art.

title: Cafetto Espresso Clean
description: Cafetto is the industry leader in effective organic and eco-friendly solutions, offering cleaning products to improve equipment performance and simplify cleaning processes. The Cafetto Clean is a rapidly soluble and free-rinsing formulation that removes coffee oils, grounds and stains. With consistent maintenance, it improves flavour and aroma of espresso. Available in three different sizes.

title: Cafetto Grinder Clean
description: Cafetto® is a specialist manufacturer of cleaning and sanitation products for coffee brewing and dispensing equipment. Completely food safe, 100% natural and gluten free, Grinder Clean cleans grinder burrs and casings as well as removing flavoured coffee odours.

title: Cafetto Grinder Clean
description: Cafetto® is a specialist manufacturer of cleaning and sanitation products for coffee brewing and dispensing equipment. Completely food safe, 100% natural and gluten free, Grinder Clean cleans grinder burrs and casings as well as removing flavoured coffee odours.

title: Marou Chocolate Tien Giang 70%
description: Six Vietnamese provinces lent their names to the single-origin chocolate bars that built Marou. As a product of nature, the cacao that defines each bar tells us so much about soil and season. Droughts tend to draw sharper, citrus notes, while heavy rains invite fruit and spice flavors to blossom. The controlled chaos of fermentation brings subtle surprises. We’re still exploring the places this fruit grows and learning new things every day. Tien Giang Some of the Mekong Delta's most delicate cacao flourishes on island orchards that lie just a boat ride away from Saigon. Look for subtle traces of cinnamon and honey in this highly accessible chocolate. Each bar is 24g

title: CAFEC Trapezoid Coffee Filter Paper 103 (for 5-7cups)
description: CAFEC is the brain child of Sanyo Sangyo, the Japanese pioneer filter paper manufacturer which developed world’s first cone shaped filter paper. The Trapezoid (flat-based) paper filters are compatible with the large Clever Coffee Drippers and the Technivorm Moccamaster automatic coffee brewer. Each packet contains 100 pieces

title: Chemex Three Cup Classic
description: The Chemex Coffeemaker is an elegant, one-piece, hourglass shaped vessel made of high quality, heat resistant glass. The traditional model comes to you with a polished wood collar and leather tie. The collar serves as an insulated handle around the middle of the coffeemaker.

title: AeroPress Micro-Filters
description: Replacement Filters for the Aeropress (350 pieces) With enough filters to last for two years, this package of 350 AeroPress microfilters keeps kitchens well stocked. The Micro-filter removes grit, unlike other press-type coffee makers. The filters are designed for use with the AeroPress, an entirely new way to make coffee. Its ideal water temperature and faster brewing yields rich flavor with lower acidity and without bitterness.

title: Hario V60 Dripper and Server Set
description: Hario has been dedicated to the design, production, and sale of heatproof glass since it was founded in 1921 and is the only heatproof glass manufacturer in Japan to have a factory. The V60 dripper is a favourite among brewers as it helps to highlight a coffee's complexity. Each set includes: 1 x Hario Glass Server (360ml) 1 x Hario V60-01 Dripper (Plastic) 1 x V60-01 Unbleached Paper Filters (40pcs) Size: W12 x D12 x H22cm Capacity: 1-2 cups

title: Marou Chocolate Dong Nai 72%
description: Six Vietnamese provinces lent their names to the single-origin chocolate bars that built Marou. As a product of nature, the cacao that defines each bar tells us so much about soil and season. Droughts tend to draw sharper, citrus notes, while heavy rains invite fruit and spice flavors to blossom. The controlled chaos of fermentation brings subtle surprises. We’re still exploring the places this fruit grows and learning new things every day. Dong Nai The jungle hills of Dong Nai Province lie northeast of Saigon. There, avocado farmers cultivate a cacao that coats the palate in the creamy, sweet and sour flavors of a tropical fruit parfait. Each bar is 24g

title: Pesado Spouted Portafilter
description: The PESADO coffee machine Portafilter has been designed to optimise efficiency and durability. The body is made entirely of stainless steel to increase strength and performance with heavy usage. This portafilter does not need to be soaked in chemicals. The stainless steel body means a simple soft wash in warm soapy water at the end of the day will keep your portafilter fresh and clean. Suitable for: LaMarzocco, Synesso, Slayer, E61, Wega, KVW.

title: Pesado Spouted Portafilter
description: The PESADO coffee machine Portafilter has been designed to optimise efficiency and durability. The body is made entirely of stainless steel to increase strength and performance with heavy usage. This portafilter does not need to be soaked in chemicals. The stainless steel body means a simple soft wash in warm soapy water at the end of the day will keep your portafilter fresh and clean. Suitable for: LaMarzocco, Synesso, Slayer, E61, Wega, KVW.

title: Marou Chocolate Dak Lak 70%
description: Six Vietnamese provinces lent their names to the single-origin chocolate bars that built Marou. As a product of nature, the cacao that defines each bar tells us so much about soil and season. Droughts tend to draw sharper, citrus notes, while heavy rains invite fruit and spice flavors to blossom. The controlled chaos of fermentation brings subtle surprises. We’re still exploring the places this fruit grows and learning new things every day. Dak Lak Elevated in the central highlands, Dak Lak's cacao benefits from cooler nights and rich soils, resulting in bright, fruity cacao with a distinctive, high-altitude flavor profile. Each bar is 24g.

title: Grounded Pleasures Exquisite Original Drinking Chocolate
description: The Original Drinking Chocolate (African Red) is one of the most pure and sumptuous chocolate experiences you can find. It is sourced from the best cocoa growing regions. It exhibits all the hallmarks of superb Forester cocoa beans and a hit of Trinatario coca beans, with delightfully high fruity notes. Made using most of the cocoa bean, the high cocoa butter content gives the cocoa a remarkable textural mouth feel when it blends with hot milk. This creates an incredibly sumptuous and invigorating hot chocolate experience. Storage Instructions Store in a cool dry place away from strong odours. Once opened use within 4 weeks, reseal after each use.

title: Hario V60 KASUYA Model
description: Tetsu Kasuya, who, in 2016, became the first Asian world champion of the WORLD BREWERS CUP, the world’s most prestigious competition for coffee brewing. Following the competition, Hario and Tetsu Kasuya collaborated to create a customized V60 Dripper for everyone to use his recipe. Under the supervision of Kasuya, the conventional rib shape of the V60 dripper has been customized. It slows the water down for better extraction of coffee, making it possible to brew stronger coffee even with the same amount of coarse grounds. This allows even beginners to easily reproduce the "4:6 method". A new coffee brewing theory created with the concept of "easily-brewed delicious coffee for everyone." Divide water into a ratio of 4 to 6. Adjust taste with the first 40% of water and density with the remaining 60%. The point is to use coarse grounds and make the second pour after the water from the first pour completely drips through. Watch Video Recipe

title: Grounded Pleasures Noir Drinking Chocolate
description: Grounded Pleasures Noir Drinking Chocolate is for people who desire an intense cocoa experience. It is smooth, complex and nuanced, without bitterness. Sourced from great cocoa growing terroirs, it has incredible depth and diversity in its chocolate flavour profile. Storage Instructions Store in a cool dry place away from strong odours. Once opened use within 4 weeks, reseal after each use.

title: Marou Chocolate Ba Ria 76%
description: Six Vietnamese provinces lent their names to the single-origin chocolate bars that built Marou. As a product of nature, the cacao that defines each bar tells us so much about soil and season. Droughts tend to draw sharper, citrus notes, while heavy rains invite fruit and spice flavors to blossom. The controlled chaos of fermentation brings subtle surprises. We’re still exploring the places this fruit grows and learning new things every day. Ba Ria Durian and lychee farmers in Ba Ria Province cultivate bright, bold cacao in red ferrous soil and coastal air seasoned by the East Sea. Expect a black current beginning and a bright candied orange finish. Each bar is 24g

title: Grounded Pleasures French Mint Drinking Chocolate
description: The French Mint Drinking Chocolate is a delightful classic chocolate-mint pairing. We subtly blend our fine Original cocoa with fresh extracted peppermint oil from a French master. The exquisitely complex, lovely high notes of peppermint marry harmoniously with the deep-toned cocoa. The French Mint Drinking Chocolate is made using most of the cocoa bean. The high cocoa butter content gives the cocoa a remarkable textural mouth feel when it blends with hot milk. This creates an incredibly sumptuous and invigorating hot chocolate experience. The quality cocoa beans together with a minimum of processing, means it has very high levels of antioxidants and flavonoids. These are the great “health giving” properties of fine chocolate. Storage Instructions Store in a cool dry place away from strong odours. Once opened use within 4 weeks, reseal after each use.

title: PPP Coffee Reusable Mug
description: Choose Reuse. There is only one Planet Earth. As part of our efforts to go green, we're pleased to present our very own stylish-looking reusable mug designed by Japan Rivers Drinkware. With a heatproof and sturdy material that does not break when dropped, the DEMITA double-wall tumbler is a versatile tumbler that is suitable for both hot and cold drinks, and perfect for those who are looking for coffee on-the-go. The reusable mug comes with a two-way lid that can be easily disassembled for cleaning. Now you don't have to worry about cleaning those stubborn coffee stains! Bring your own reusable cup and enjoy discounts off your takeaway drinks at participating cafes by PPP Coffee in Singapore. Product Specifications Material Polypropylene (Cup, Lid), Silicone Rubber (Lid) Capacity 350ml Size 85mm (W) x 85mm (D) x 121mm (H) Weight 100g Dishwasher safe Yes

title: PPP Coffee Reusable Tote
description: Whether you’re headed to the market, or to the beach, you‘ll never go out of style with this classic reusable tote. Designed with the coffee lover in mind, this canvas bag comes with an inner pocket, and is perfect for your coffee runs. This limited release tote is currently in its second edition. The first was designed and launched in 2019 to mark our rebranding to PPP Coffee in conjunction with our 10th year anniversary. Specifications Measurements (cm) 25.5 x 9.5 x 40 Material Canvas

title: Marou Chocolate Origin Plus - Mekong Kumquat & Tien Giang
description: Six Vietnamese provinces lent their names to the single-origin chocolate bars that built Marou. As a product of nature, the cacao that defines each bar tells us so much about soil and season. Droughts tend to draw sharper, citrus notes, while heavy rains invite fruit and spice flavors to blossom. The controlled chaos of fermentation brings subtle surprises. We’re still exploring the places this fruit grows and learning new things every day. Mekong Kumquat & Tien Giang Calamondin kumquats are small, flavourful citrus fruits that grow in the Mekong Delta provinces. Combining these two together, we get a unique citrus taste that matches perfectly with the trinitario cacao from the same origin, enhancing the subtle tanginess. Each bar is 80g

title: Send A Gift Card
description: Practical gifts don’t have to be boring Be it for a birthday, date or anniversary, the PPP Coffee e-gift card allows you to personalise your message for your recipient, and is perfect for any occasion. Send an e-gift card today and make someone's day! Terms and Conditions: E-gift cards will be sent via email to the email address input at checkout. To ensure that it gets send to your intended recipient, please input their email address. All gift cards are valid for use within six (6) months from the date of purchase. All gift cards can only be used to offset purchases listed on pppcoffee.com. Gift card value cannot be used to offset fees from subscription orders or in-stores. PPP Coffee reserves the rights to amend and/or vary the Terms and Conditions at its own discretion, without prior notice. Other Terms and Conditions may apply.

title: Brewista Artisan Electric Gooseneck Kettle
description: The Brewista Artisan Gooseneck Kettle is both stylish and functional. Its temperature precision function allows a perfect brew of coffee or tea anytime. The gooseneck and special angle spout also promises higher pour control, and an ergonomic, easy-grip handle for comfort. It also has the following features - Super boil function without temperature preset Real-time temperature display Keep warm function maintains temperature for up to an hour Tempered glass touch display for easy-use and easy-clean Product Specifications Capacity 1 Litre Voltage 220V, Singapore plug Temperature Control 60 to 99C For warranty, please register directly with Brewista.

title: Cafetto RESTORE Descaler
description: A safe and effective descaling powder for espresso and pod/capsule machines. Each sachet (25g) makes up to one litre of descaling solution diluted. Designed for: Espresso machine boilers, Pod/Capsule coffee machines, thermoblock espresso machines

title: Airscape Airtight Coffee Canister
description: Keep your beans fresh longer with the Airscape airtight coffee canister. With a stainless steel body that fits up to 600g of coffee beans, this coffee canister features a specially-designed lid that removes and locks out air from inside the container, so that your coffee beans can stay fresh longer. Bring back this canister to participating outlets by PPP Coffee to enjoy additional 50g more coffee on us with Reload. Find out more here. Product Specifications Size (cm) 13 x 13 x 17.5 Weight 450g Colour White Material Stainless Steel

title: Rocket Giotto Cronometro R
description: Build your home-cafe with the Rocket Giotto Cronometro R. Want to see, touch, try out the machine? Book a demo. Features taken directly from our commercial espresso machine range give the Cronometro machines superior technology that is normally only found in full sized commercial espresso machines. Now with digital shot timer, PID temperature control, insulated boilers and the Rocket Espresso 9 mm boiler end plates, stability and temperature control is further enhanced. The use of a rotary pump ensures quiet yet robust pump performance and allows the user to have the machine draw water from the internal machine reservoir or alternatively connect the machine directly to the water supply. PPP Coffee is an authorised reseller for Rocket Espresso in Singapore. For enquiries, please email customerservice@pppcoffee.com.

title: Marou Chocolate Lam Dong 74%
description: Six Vietnamese provinces lent their names to the single-origin chocolate bars that built Marou. As a product of nature, the cacao that defines each bar tells us so much about soil and season. Droughts tend to draw sharper, citrus notes, while heavy rains invite fruit and spice flavors to blossom. The controlled chaos of fermentation brings subtle surprises. We’re still exploring the places this fruit grows and learning new things every day. Lam Dong This cacao thrives at the foot of lush forested hills in Vietnam's central highlands. Lam Dong Province's cool mountains yield a mild chocolate but look alive for traces of prune, raisin, and espresso. Each bar is 24g

title: "Slowly But Surely" Mini Drip Kettle
description: The perfect tool to level up your pourovers and filter coffee brewing experience. Featuring a gooseneck for more controlled flow rates and precise directional pouring, this mini drip kettle is the perfect companion for your pourovers from V60 to Chemex, and even drip bags. Pour in perfect concentric circles and always hit your target brew weight with this drip kettle set. Product Specifications Size (cm) 7.5 x 9 x 8.5 Colour Matte Black Material Stainless Steel Weight 227 g Capacity 300 ml

title: Marou Chocolate Ben Tre 78%
description: Six Vietnamese provinces lent their names to the single-origin chocolate bars that built Marou. As a product of nature, the cacao that defines each bar tells us so much about soil and season. Droughts tend to draw sharper, citrus notes, while heavy rains invite fruit and spice flavors to blossom. The controlled chaos of fermentation brings subtle surprises. We’re still exploring the places this fruit grows and learning new things every day. Ben Tre Grown in the shade of the Mekong Delta's sweetest coconuts, Ben Tre Province's cacao speaks to the sweetness and strength of its people. The flavors range from dried coconut to young banana, but always remind us of the good that sprouts out of the ground in Vietnam. Each bar is 24g.

title: Send A Coffee Subscription: Pods
description: Not sure what to give a coffee-lover? Gifting should not be brain-wrecking. Trust us when we say you'll never go wrong with coffee. And, getting coffee should never be a chore. Send a gift of convenience in the form of a pod. How It Works: • Step 1: Pick their favourite Supernova Pod (or ask us for a recommendation) • Step 2: Add to cart and checkout • Step 3: Sit back, relax and we'll deliver your present once a month for the next 3 months! The first delivery will include a box of 40 pods, your gift message and add-on(s) if any. Subsequently, they will be receiving only the box of 40 pods. Questions? We'll answer them here.

title: Send A Coffee Subscription: Surprise Box
description: Not sure what to give a coffee-lover? Gifting should not be brain-wrecking. Trust us when we say you'll never go wrong with coffee, and even better when it is a surprise! This one is for the adventurous. Elevate their home-brewing experience through a curated line-up of coffees sourced from different regions around the world with our Surprise Box, and keep it going for 3 months! • Step 1: Select 1 or 2 bags 1 Bag: The receiver will receive a bag of seasonal limited release filter coffee. 2 Bags: The receiver will receive a bag of seasonal limited release filter coffee, and another bag of filter coffee from our regular selection. • Step 2: Add to cart and checkout • Step 3: Sit back, relax and we'll deliver your present once a month for the next 3 months! The first delivery will include the Surprise Box, your gift message and add-on(s) if any. Subsequently, they will be receiving only the Surprise Box. Questions? We'll answer them here.

title: Bruer Filter & Dispersion Disc
description: The Bruer Standard Coffee Filter Dispersion Disc has been specifically designed to help improve your brewing method. This reusable stainless steel filter disc replaces the use of your existing paper filters when using brewing devices like the Bruer, Aeropress, and Delter Press. Features: Reuseable, just rinse and wipe after your brew is finished and you're ready to go again. No need to pre-wet, will not give you any taste associated with paper filters Lets through some of the oils that would normally be filtered out when using paper filters Made from Stainless Steel What's the difference between the Standard Disc and the Fine Disc? Standard Disc: Slightly thicker grade than the Fine, more rigid and difficult bend, the standard disc yields a fuller cup as it allows more oils into the cup due to the slightly larger hole diameter. Fine Disc: The fine disc produces a very sweet and clean cup, retains a lot more of the fines than the standard especially once you have adapted your brewing st

title: Hario Cha Cha Kyusu Teapot
description: Hario has been dedicated to the design, production, and sale of heatproof glass since it was founded in 1921 and is the only heatproof glass manufacturer in Japan to have a factory. Enjoy your afternoon tea in style with this Japanese heatproof glassware teapot by Hario. Perfect for brewing the cascara, or other varieties of tea, opt for either just the teapot to complement your tea setup or own your first tea set which includes: 1 x Heatproof glass teapot with strainer ( 450ml) 2 x Glass cups Made in Japan.

We can only imagine the horror and frustration when one realises the box supposedly filled with the much needed energy boost is empty. Don't let that happen to you. With the new prepaid 12-month Supernova Pod Subscription plan, get your favourite Supernova pods delivered to your doorstep with delivery* included! How It Works: • Step 1: Pick your choice of pod • Step 2: Add to cart and checkout • Step 3: Sit back, relax and await your monthly pod delivery *Applicable for Singapore only. title: Oatside Oat Milk - Barista Blend
description: Always look on the OATSIDE of life. Need oat milk all day everyday? Subscribe and have it delivered to your heart's desire. Psst~ You also save 10% as a subscriber. How's that for benefits! Oatside Oat Milk is a dairy-free alternative milk, perfectly balanced, creamy enough for a rich mouthfeel, but allows for coffee notes to shine through. The Barista Blend froths to create the silkiest, densest microfoam for latte art. ---- Product Highlights: Barista-Grade Made with Australian oats 100% plant-based, no saturated fats, lactose-free, no added sugar No added-flavours, gums, emulsifiers Contains beta glucans for digestive and heart health, high in calcium Ingredients: Oat Base (Water, Oats), Canola Oil, Acidity Regulator (Dipotassium Phosphate), Calcium Carbonate, Sea Salt Storage Instructions: Store in a cool and dry place, avoid direct sunlight or temperature changes. After opening the bottle, please refrigerate below 4 ° C and consume within 5 days.

title: Seasonal Double Insulated Tumbler (10oz)
description: CHOOSE REUSE. THERE IS ONLY ONE PLANET EARTH. 'I like my coffee lukewarm.' says no one ever. Keep your coffee at its ideal drinking temperature with our double insulated tumbler. Its thick 304 stainless steel double walls will keep your coffee hot or cold for up to 6 hours. On the go? The lid screws tight, creating a leak-proof seal so you'll never have to worry about spills and mess. Bring your own reusable cup and enjoy S$1 off your takeaway drinks at participating cafe/retail outlets by PPP Coffee in Singapore. Product Specifications Material 304 Stainless Steel Capacity 300ml Size 85mm (D) x 170mm (H) Weight 151g

title: CSHH Miniature LEGO Coffee Shop
description: Bring home a piece of CSHH. As we mark our 10th year in the Jalan Besar neighbourhood, we invite you to celebrate this milestone with us with a miniature figure of our coffee shop. As you build your own piece of CSHH, let yourself reminisce in the conversations and connections you had here with the people who hold a special meaning, just like how each and everyone of you played an integral part in our journey thus far.

title: Supernova Drip Bags - Fusion
description: Cafe-style coffee redesigned for the everyday drinker in single-serve drip bags. From blends to single origins, each one is roasted to perfection and crafted with excellence alongside 10 years of coffee roasting expertise - to deliver that unparalleled cafe experience in your cup. Fusion Current Composition: Brazil Rio Brilhante, India Thippanahalli We Taste: Roasted Nuts, Caramel, Dark Chocolate Recommended Recipe: Pour 200ml of 92°C water over drip bag. Each box contains 9 drip bags.

title: Seasonal Reusable Bag
description: Need a bag that you can reuse over and over again to hold your coffee haul, groceries, life's ups and downs etc..? Our reusable bag comes in two designs; Classic and Seasonal, and two sizes, so take your pick. Find out more about our other sustainability efforts - Choose Reuse.

title: CSHH Must Drink Coffee Enamel Mug
description: Take a trip down the memory lane with us as we pay tribute to the lane of metal and hardware companies that stood alongside us. This limited edition 'Must Drink Coffee' enamel mug brings us back to the time where our forefathers choice of drink-ware was simple, yet high quality, non-toxic, and shatter-free. Proven to have withstand the test of time, this mug will be good for years to come that you may even be able to pass it down to future generations.

title: Rapha Custom Women's Pro Team Training Jersey
description: The Women's Pro Team Training Jersey features light and highly breathable fabric around the waist and pockets to allow for better heat convection and moisture evaporation. The large front and back panels use an alternate fabric to give UPF40 sun protection. Save up to 15% on your kit when you purchase the Pro Team Training Jersey with the Pro Team Training Bib Shorts. Size Guide Sizing (cm) XXS XS S M L XL Chest 78 83 88 93 98 103 Waist 61 66 71 76 81 86 Hips 86 91 96 101 106 111

title: Classic Double Insulated Tumbler (10oz)
description: CHOOSE REUSE. THERE IS ONLY ONE PLANET EARTH. 'I like my coffee lukewarm.' says no one ever. Keep your coffee at its ideal drinking temperature with our double insulated tumbler. Its thick 304 stainless steel double walls will keep your coffee hot or cold for up to 6 hours. On the go? The lid screws tight, creating a leak-proof seal so you'll never have to worry about spills and mess. Bring your own reusable cup and enjoy S$1 off your takeaway drinks at participating cafe/retail outlets by PPP Coffee in Singapore. Product Specifications Material 304 Stainless Steel Capacity 300ml Size 85mm (D) x 170mm (H) Weight 151g

title: Supernova Drip Bags - Nurita Estate
description: Cafe-style coffee redesigned for the everyday drinker in single-serve drip bags. From blends to single origins, each one is roasted to perfection and crafted with excellence alongside 10 years of coffee roasting expertise - to deliver that unparalleled cafe experience in your cup. Nurita Estate, India Country/Region: India/ Coorg Varietal: S 795, Cauvery, Chandrigiri Processing: Washed Elevation: 1100 m.a.s.l. We Taste: Apricot, Pecan, Milk Chocolate Recommended Recipe: Pour 200ml of 92°C water over drip bag. Each box contains 9 drip bags.

title: CSHH x Takachya Cycling Cap
description: In collaboration with Takachya.cc, this one of a kind cycling cap celebrates the iconic spaces that made those special coffee moments. You will find familiar elements and details of Chye Seng Huat Hardware, such as the iconic concept bar which provides a one-of-its-kind coffee experience with a 360-degree view of the bar, tastefully arranged into a functional daily headwear for your rides (or a fashion piece). This limited series is perfect for the caffeine addict! Made with 100% cotton, it's lightweight, breathable, and comfortable for Singapore's heat and humidity. Hand wash with mild soap only to preserve its colour. Product Specifications Type 3 panel cap Print quality Digitally printed Material 100% cotton Elastic sweatband stitched at hem Size 56-59cm Produced in Europe

title: PPP Classic Reusable Bag
description: Need a bag that you can reuse over and over again to hold your coffee haul, groceries, life's ups and downs etc..? Our reusable bag comes in two designs; Classic and Seasonal, and two sizes, so take your pick. Find out more about our other sustainability efforts - Choose Reuse .

title: PPP Classic Reusable Bag
description: Need a bag that you can reuse over and over again to hold your coffee haul, groceries, life's ups and downs etc..? Our reusable bag comes in two designs; Classic and Seasonal, and two sizes, so take your pick. Find out more about our other sustainability efforts - Choose Reuse .

You will find elements and details that you are familiar with as a frequent patron of PPP Coffee, tastefully arranged into a functional daily headwear for your rides (or as a fashion piece). This limited series is perfect for the caffeine addict! Made with 100% cotton, it's lightweight, breathable, and comfortable for Singapore's heat and humidity. Hand wash with mild soap only to preserve its colour. title: Supernova Pod Subscription + Morning Machine
description: Enjoy 365 days of quality coffee, anytime, anywhere. If you: Drink one or two cups a day or go through a low volume monthly Work from home or in a small office Enjoy being able to customise your brew without an elaborate setup This subscription is for you. At S$85 a month *, own the Morning machine at 40% off (U.P. S$660), and have 40 of your favourite Supernova pods delivered to your doorstep for 12 months. Need more than 40 pods? Get 100 Supernova pods with the Morning machine at S$148 a month! *There is a commitment period of one-year for this subscription. Should the subscription be terminated prematurely, the prorated amount for the remaining months will be charged. This subscription is applicable in Singapore only. Terms and Conditions apply. Want to find out more about the Morning machine? Head down to PPP Coffee at Funan or the Annex (within CSHH) to see, touch, brew with it.

title: Mazzer Omega Hand Grinder
description: Professional Coffee Shop Results Both At Home And On The Go The Omega is the latest addition to the Mazzer family line-up: a stunning handgrinder, designed for coffee excellence both at home and on the go. Crafted of premium materials, the minimalistic yet solid design, is made from high-tech machinery-processed steel and aluminum bars. Featuring carbon fibre components guaranteed for strength and lightness; the neodymium magnets offer durability-tested performance; and the stainless steel and anodized aluminium optimise mechanical performance. Versatile and easy-to-use, the Omega handgrinder is suitable for all coffee preparation – from French press to espresso, ibrik to filter coffee. Product Specifications Height: 196 mm Width: 78 mm Weight: 750 g Burr diameter: 47 mm Burrs: 198C fast, 199C soft conical burrs Body material: stainless steel and anodised aluminium Burrs material: stainless steel Axle material: stainless steel Lever material: carbon fibre Knob and tank material: anodis

title: Marco BRU Filter Paper - 1000pc (Wholesale)
description: Marco BRU Filter Paper SKU: 8000200 Filter Paper Pourover Compatible with the following Marco Coffee Brewers: Marco BRU F60M 2.2L Marco BRU F60A 2.2L Marco BRU F45M 1.8L Marco BRU F45A 1.8L

title: Nobo - Barista Grade Coconut Milk
description: Nobo Barista Grade Coconut Milk is a dairy-free alternative milk, made from a blend of pressed coconut meat and coconut water. Short for No Bovine, Nobo uses only fresh coconut, instead of frozen coconut. Ingredients: Fresh Coconut Milk, Water. Fresh Coconut Water, Sugar, Emulsifier (Sucrose Esters of Fatty Acids and Mono- and Diglycerides of Fatty Acids) Salt, Stabilizers (Carrageenan, Gellan Gum, Acidity Regulator (Sodium Bicarbonate) Storage Instructions: Store in a cool and dry place, avoid direct sunlight or temperature changes. After opening the bottle, please refrigerate below 4 ° C and consume within 3 days.

title: The Morning Machine
description: Receive a complimentary Supernova Pods variety pack (worth S$54) with purchase of a Morning machine The World's First Nespresso-Compatible Coffee Capsule Machine With Barista-Designed Controls Designed to elevate the home-coffee drinking experience with precise controls that also delivers a convenient and intuitive experience for both the home barista and the everyday coffee drinker, the Morning machine sets itself apart from traditional capsule machines with these 3 key features: 10 Curated Recipes From a classic espresso shot, to a Kyoto style slow drip, the Morning machine comes with 10 curated recipes to support your drinking needs. Access To World-Class Roaster Recipes Enjoy parallel access to cafe-quality coffee recipes developed by Morning's global network of leading roasters with the touch of a dial. Personalised "Brew-By-You" Dashboard Customise your recipes to your palate using the Morning mobile app. Store them in your recipe repertoire or directly to your machine for easy a

title: PWP: Hario V60 02 Indigo Blue Ceramic Dripper
description: The Hario V60 coffee dripper is one of the most classic coffee brewing equipment. Conical shaped with inner spiral ribs, the V60 dripper is the dripper to go for to achieve a simple and delicious cup that can enhance the complexity of a coffee. Watch our video tutorial on how easy it is! Designed and manufactured by Hario Asia exclusively for PPP Coffee in Singapore, the ceramic Hario V60 dripper is now available in a range of 5 fun colours.

title: Book A Demo
description: Want to see, touch, try out, and understand how the machine works before committing? Book a demo to do so! Machines & Grinders available: Rocket Appartamento TCA GB Rocket R Cinquantotto (R58) Varia VS3 Grinder (2nd Generation) Mahlkonig X54 The Morning Machine Location: The Annex (within CSHH): 150 Tyrwhitt Road, Singapore 207563 Please note that demo bookings should be made two working days in advance. Your slot will be confirmed via email. If you do not receive a confirmation from us, please do get in touch with us via email at customerservice@pppcoffee.com, or through social media.

title: Oatside Oat Milk - Barista Blend Subscription
description: OATSIDE to your doorstep. Let our bears do the heavy-lifting for you. Subscribe and have OATSIDE Oat Milk delivered right to your doorstep. The only lifting you'll need to do now is to lift your finger to click subscribe, and subsequently lift the cup to your lips to taste that oh so creamy cup of goodness, all day, every day. ---- Product Highlights: Barista-Grade Made with Australian oats 100% plant-based, no saturated fats, lactose-free, no added sugar No added-flavours, gums, emulsifiers Contains beta glucans for digestive and heart health, high in calcium Ingredients: Oat Base (Water, Oats), Canola Oil, Acidity Regulator (Dipotassium Phosphate). Calcium Carbonate, Sea Salt Storage Instructions: Store in a cool and dry place, avoid direct sunlight or temperature changes. After opening the bottle, please refrigerate below 4 ° C and consume within 5 days.

title: Grounded Pleasures Seven Spice Chai
description: The Seven Spice Chai is a unique product of seven freshly ground spices, sourced directly from some of the world's finest spice farms. The spices are blended with an organic, unrefined jaggery sugar (evaporated sugar cane juice) and a natural Sri Lankan tea extract. Our balance of spices ensures that the flavours are not too overpowering. This chai has been created to have a flavour as close as possible to a chai from a street wallah served in India or Sri Lanka. Gluten free. Vegan. Delicious. Ingredients : Organic unrefined jaggery cane sugar, cinnamon, natural black tea extract (5.1%), cardamon, ginger, star anise, nutmeg, cloves, black pepper. Storage Instructions Store in a cool dry place away from strong odours. Once opened, use within 4 weeks, reseal after each use.

title: Varia VS3 Dosing Cup
description: A New Approach To Dosing With VS3 A 60g capacity dosing cup with increased height to reduce static blowback from high roast coffees or coffees with more chaff. Easily transfer from cup to portafilter with purpose built interchangeable heads for compatibility with 54mm & 58mm baskets. Product Specifications: Capacity: 60g Weight: 165g Dimensions: H: 80mm W: 60mm

title: Varia AKU Scale
description: The AKU scale has been developed to be your perfect counter-top coffee scale for home or commercial brewing featuring both auto-tare/timing modes for espresso as well as full manual modes so you can control every variable. Precision Load Cell + 9-digit LED Display AKU is fitted with an extremely high quality load cell with 0.1g sensitivity across the entire weighing range providing ultimate accuracy and precision combined with an ultra clear 9 digit LED display. Primary Foundry Alloy Body Construction Primary foundry alloys are know for excellent quality and high purity providing an extremely strong and durable body while also being extremely resistant to high temperatures. High Precision CNC Machining 0.02mm Tolerances Die Cast and CNC machined to industry levels of precision to ensure the most precise tolerances and accuracy and stability when making adjustments and weighing. IPX5 Waterproof AKU is IPX5 water resistant and is protected against low pressure water stream from any angle

title: Varia VS3 Grinder (2nd Generation)
description: The Next Generation Of Grinders The VS3 is a highly compact electric grinder that has extreme performance from commercial espresso settings to hand drip and cold brew. Want to see, touch, try out the machine? Book a demo. Zero Retention Focus The Varia VS3 (Varia Stepless 38mm) Electric Grinder utilises a sloped geometry with a 76.5° acute angle. Using this geometry also allows for ideal zero retention conditions as well as a better workflow in relation to adding coffee to the hopper, making grind adjustments, and 180° access to the dosing cup. Purging will not be necessary when grinding different coffees with a retention of less than 0.1 over a 10g dose. Precision Stepless Grind Adjustments The stepless adjustment is operated by turning the hopper in the desired direction. As a result of the stepless assembly, you can achieve virtually endless particle sizes giving you full access to experimenting with your brews. 2nd Generation Motor New motor construction with full stainless steel g

description: The Perfect Kettle For Any Brew Introducing the Varia Aura Kettle 0.8L, designed for precision brewing enthusiasts seeking ultimate control over their brewing process. Crafted with versatility and performance in mind, this kettle boasts increased volume and temperature control, making it ideal for home use and professional settings alike. title: Varia 38mm Hypernova Burr Set
description: Improved top end range for espresso particle distribution at finer sizes. Medium body, increased clarity with slightly more balanced profile when comparing to the Supernova Titanium coated burr set. Base Material A base material of 440 Stainless Steel is used for the Hypernova burr set offering an edge hardness of HRC65. Durability & Heat Sinking The titanium coated burrs will have an increase in durability and also heat resistance. The burrs will stay cooler on the cutting edge during grinding and as a result this will impact the overall durability and sharpness of the cutting edge. Particle Distribution The grinding range of the titanium coated burr vs the regular stainless steel will be improved at the top end of finer particle sizes. Grind Speed & Consistency The grind speed of the titanium coated burr is slightly slower than that of the stainless steel burr type. The reason for this is the slightly smoother surface of the cutting edge material after treatment as well as the added

title: Varia EVO Hybrid Grinder (Coming Soon)
description: The World's First Hybrid Grinder Introducing the Varia EVO Grinder, the world's first true full alloy body hybrid hand grinder that revolutionises traditional grinding methods. A groundbreaking approach that combines the power of USB-C technology with the reliability of our hand grinder, resulting in a compact, lightweight, and exceptionally powerful device. Redefining The Boundaries Of Grinding Designed specifically for coffee enthusiasts and specialty connoisseurs, the Varia EVO Grinder stands as a pinnacle of performance. Its advanced burr design, featuring lightweight aluminum construction and an ultra-smooth drive assembly, ensures unparalleled grinding precision. Ultra Precise Adjustment At its core, the Varia EVO Grinder embodies exceptional consistency and efficiency, seamlessly transitioning between manual crank and power modes. With its micro stepped adjustment, offering over 180 steps of precision, it effortlessly handles a wide range of grind sizes and roast profiles. To en

title: PWP: Seasonal Double Insulated Tumbler (10oz)
description: CHOOSE REUSE. THERE IS ONLY ONE PLANET EARTH. 'I like my coffee lukewarm.' says no one ever. Keep your coffee at its ideal drinking temperature with our double insulated tumbler. Its thick 304 stainless steel double walls will keep your coffee hot or cold for up to 6 hours. On the go? The lid screws tight, creating a leak-proof seal so you'll never have to worry about spills and mess. Bring your own reusable cup and enjoy S$1 off your takeaway drinks at participating cafe/retail outlets by PPP Coffee in Singapore. Product Specifications Material 304 Stainless Steel Capacity 300ml Size 85mm (D) x 170mm (H) Weight 151g

Machines & Grinders available: Rocket Appartamento TCA GB Rocket R Cinquantotto (R58) Varia VS3 Grinder (2nd Generation) Mahlkonig X54 The Morning Machine Location: The Annex (within CSHH): 150 Tyrwhitt Road, Singapore 207563 Please note that demo bookings should be made two working days in advance. Your slot will be confirmed via email. If you do not receive a confirmation from us, please do get in touch with us via email at customerservice@pppcoffee.com, or through social media.

title: Nuts & Bolts
description: Current Composition: Guatemala El Hato, Brazil Rio Brilhante, Ethiopia Suke Quto We Taste: Citrus, Almond , Dark Chocolate Recommended Recipe: Dry Coffee Weight: 19g / Beverage Weight: 38g / 30 seconds Nuts & Bolts is a blend that has always been a representation of who we are and what we aim to be. This iteration comprises of 3 origins from Guatemala, Brazil and Ethiopia, with a pleasant citrus acidity, yet balanced with a lovely nutty and chocolatey finish.

title: Cascara Tea, La Esmeralda
description: Cascara, meaning ‘skin’ or ‘peel’ in Spanish, is the skin of the coffee cherry, which is typically discarded after the cherries are washed and depulped. Once dried, it makes for a unique and refreshing tea. From the Boquete region in Panama, Hacienda La Esmeralda is an award-winning farm run by the Peterson family. Having won the Best of Panama auctions multiple times, La Esmeralda is an estate with a long and rich history. As a family-run business, they pride themselves on high quality coffee that is internationally acclaimed. They were one of the first producers to separate coffee lots by varietals, and in their forward-thinking, their Gesha varietal lot won the 2004 national competition for its juicy brightness and multi-layered aromatics. The fame of the varietal grew and today Gesha varietals are sold for one of the highest prices in coffee's history. With this prized Gesha varietal, La Esmeralda has produced cascara from the skin of the coffee fruit. Careful drying is required to

title: Fellow Carter Move Mug 12oz
description: Meet Carter Move Mug, a travel mug finally worthy of the coffee inside. Designed to amplify the senses and engineered to fit your travel needs with a snap-in splash guard and slim width, you can now enjoy coffee at its fullest on-the-go. Snap-in Splash Guard Drinkable Thin Lip True Taste Ceramic Coating Heat-lock Double Wall Vacuum Leak-proof Seal Product Specifications Capacity 12oz (354.88ml) Dimension 77 mm diameter body, 62 mm mouth, 158 mm tall with lid, 135 mm tall without lid Material 18/8 stainless steel, BPA-free plastic and steel lid, inner ceramic coating Splash Guard Yes

title: Terra Firma
description: Current Composition : Guatemala El Hato, Costa Rica Rio Grande We Taste : Red Berries, Macadamia Nut, Milk Chocolate Recommended Recipe : Dry Coffee Weight: 20g, Beverage Weight: 40g / 30 seconds. Terra Firma was the name of the very first blend that we put together during our humble beginnings at the backyard of a shophouse along Hooper Road. As part of our efforts to Pay It Forward, we pledge to contribute $2 to St Andrew’s Autism Centre for every bag of Terra Firma Blend sold. If you would like to join us in supporting this cause, you can grab a bag of Terra Firma Blend at our retail or online shop. Your contributions will enable SAAC to continue supporting over 450 students, clients and residents to access a life of quality, dignity and meaning.

title: 40 Winks Decaf
description: Current Offering : Mexico Grapos Mountain Water Decaf Country/Region: Mexico Grapos, Chiapas Varietal: Typica, Marsellesa, Bourbon Processing: Fully-Washed Elevation: 700 - 1600 m.a.s.l. Decaffeination Method : Mountain Water Process We Taste : Plums, Brown Sugar, Milk Chocolate Recommended Recipe : Dry Coffee Weight: 19g - Beverage Weight: 38g - 26-28 seconds Want a mid-day cuppa but worried you’ll be up past midnight? 40 Winks was created for that exact reason. Mountain Water Decaf is a decaffeination process that does not use chemicals, but instead, clear water from Pico de Orizaba, the highest mountain in Mexico. The result is an organically-certified coffee that is 99.9% caffeine-free. The GRAPOS (Grupo de Agricultores Positivos S.P.R.) organisation was founded in 2007, to provide producers in the Chiapas region with the necessary guidance to produce high quality coffee. This comes in the form of technical assistance, free seedlings to replace damaged trees, in addition to other e

title: PWP: Hario V60 02 Pink Ceramic Dripper
description: The Hario V60 coffee dripper is one of the most classic coffee brewing equipment. Conical shaped with inner spiral ribs, the V60 dripper is the dripper to go for to achieve a simple and delicious cup that can enhance the complexity of a coffee. Watch our video tutorial on how easy it is! Designed and manufactured by Hario Asia exclusively for PPP Coffee in Singapore, the ceramic Hario V60 dripper is now available in a range of 5 fun colours.

description: Current Offering : Mexico Grapos Mountain Water Decaf Country/Region: Mexico Grapos, Chiapas Varietal: Typica, Marsellesa, Bourbon Processing: Fully-Washed Elevation: 700 - 1600 m.a.s.l. Decaffeination Method : Mountain Water Process We Taste : Plums, Brown Sugar, Milk Chocolate Recommended Recipe : Dry Coffee Weight: 19g - Beverage Weight: 38g - 26-28 seconds Want a mid-day cuppa but worried you’ll be up past midnight? 40 Winks was created for that exact reason. Mountain Water Decaf is a decaffeination process that does not use chemicals, but instead, clear water from Pico de Orizaba, the highest mountain in Mexico. The result is an organically-certified coffee that is 99.9% caffeine-free. The GRAPOS (Grupo de Agricultores Positivos S.P.R.) organisation was founded in 2007, to provide producers in the Chiapas region with the necessary guidance to produce high quality coffee. title: Ethiopia Suke Quto Subscription
description: Country/Region: Ethiopia/Guji Varietal: Welicho & Kurume Processing: Fully-Washed Elevation: 1850 - 2200 m.a.s.l. We Taste: Peach, Earl Grey Tea, Citrus Finish Suke Quto has been one of our long-term coffee partners since 2014, and with each harvest we are reminded yet again of just how unique this coffee from Shakiso is. Blessed with consistent rainfall and climate, a high altitude, and fertile soil, Tesfaye Bekele's farm has continued to flourish as he continuously makes improvements to both his perspective to farming and also incorporating new technologies. Comprised primarily of two varietals endemic to Ethiopia, coffee cherries are stringently harvested and sorted for ripeness, and depulped before undergoing a long fermentation for up to 48 hours in concrete tanks. Coffees are then laid out to dry over the course of 12 to 16 days, regularly turned and protected in tarpaulin during the midday and during the night to ensure even and consistent drying. His pursuit for quality is equa

title: Fritz Coffee Company - Ethiopia, Yirgacheffe Lalesa, Slow Dry Natural 200g
description: Country: Yirgacheffe, Ethiopia Varietal: Heirloom Processing: Slow Dry Natural Elevation: 2200 m.a.s.l. We Taste: Cranberry, Melon, Zest, Ceylon Tea This is a brand new wet mill set up in 2023 where future plans include a modern processing facility. This wet mill collects cherries from local small-holder producers in the region. Coffees in Ethiopia are typically grown on very small plots of land by farmers who also grow other crops. The majority of smallholders will deliver their coffee in cherry to a nearby washing station or central processing unit, where their coffee will be sorted, weighed, and paid for or given a receipt.

description: Introducing the Varia STEEP Cold Brewer: Elevate Your Cold Brew Experience Experience the next level of cold brew mastery with our Varia STEEP Cold Brewer. Designed to deliver unparalleled convenience and flavor control, this innovative brewing system redefines the art of cold coffee extraction. Revolutionary Closed Basket System Say goodbye to messy brewing processes. Our STEEP Cold Brewer features a revolutionary closed basket design that ensures a pristine brewing environment while allowing water to seamlessly flow through to the spout. Gain precise control over flavour and concentration, creating cold brew perfection with every batch. Crafted for Quality and Durability Crafted with premium borosilicate glass, BPA-free plastics, and silicone, our cold brewer is built to last. title: Rhino Self Levelling Tamp 58mm - Black
description: Ensure consistent pressure with every tamp with the Self-Levelling Tamp from Rhino Coffee Gear. Featuring a professional standard 58mm flat base, a self-levelling tamp mechanism and an ergonomic handle for comfortable tamping, the Rhino Self-Levelling Tamp is a great addition to your barista tool kit. This tamper uses an inner spring mechanism within the handle of the tamper with a lip above the base to ensure you use the same force and get an even tamp every time. Material: Stainless Steel, Plastic

title: Supernova Pods - Ethiopia Subscription
description: Cafe-style coffee redesigned for the everyday drinker in Nespresso-compatible pods. Supernova was born out of an obsession and a dedication to make high quality coffees more accessible to the everyday coffee drinker. Wherever you might be, you can always enjoy a delicious tasting cup, with our high quality Nespresso-compatible pods. Now available in 100% aluminium. If you're looking for a coffee that has fruity and floral notes with bright and pleasant acidity, Ethiopia is for you. Best enjoyed black. Current Offering: Ethiopia Suke Quto Origin : Guji, Ethiopia Varietal : Kurume & Welicho Processing : Fully-Washed Altitude : 1850 - 2200 m.a.s.l. Expect to Taste : Peach, Earl Grey Tea, Citrus *Please note that coffee offering may change or vary depending on availability. Please refer to the product page for the most up to date .

title: Party & Tanlines - An Event by JOURN and PPP Coffee, 9 Nov 2024
description: Coffee and biking, hand in hand, has been universally loved by all across decades. Join us for an evening of celebrations as we pay tribute to the old and the new, raising awareness for the people of the sport while highlighting the bond between both cultures. Date: Saturday, 9 November 2024 Time: 6pm to 930pm Venue: PPP Coffee @ New Bahru (46 Kim Yam Road, 01-06) Ticket Price: Free Limited edition merchandise will be available for purchase on event night. You’ll also get a chance to vote for the winners of “Tanlines”, a joint community photography competition, with top three prizes by JOURN and PPP Coffee. Last but not least, we’ll be hosting a fireside chat with both female leaders from JOURN and PPP Coffee, Georgienne Lee and Xanthe Ang, to discuss their experiences running their local brands as women. Light bites and refreshments will be provided. Seats are limited to the first 100 only.

title: PPP Coffee x JOURN Everyday Tote - Samsui Blue
description: A limited edition lifestyle collection in collaboration with two homegrown brands JOURN and PPP Coffee. An ode to the old and new - we pay tribute to the Samsui women of Singapore who were integral in building Singapore's infrastructure in the 1930s. As the saying goes, "Do not forget your roots". Our story reimagines our founding mothers nurturing and growing two intertwined cultures - coffee and cycling. May we never forget why we began. Constructed with the same durable 100% cotton canvas fabric as our Everyday Totes, the limited edition Samsui Blue Tote features a printed text and Samsui graphic. Our daily go-to bag for anywhere and everywhere. Good for university days, brunch days, work days, recovery days, or picnics in the park - this time with some homegrown flair. Fabric & Function: 12-oz 100% Cotton Canvas Two exterior pockets for easy access of personal items Shortened strap lengths for all builds Made in Malaysia 37.5cm L x 37cm H x 10cm W Care: Pre-treat any stains on your

title: Rocket Appartamento TCA GB
description: The next generation of Appartamento Want to see, touch, try out the machine? Book a demo. Rocket Espresso proudly introduces the all new Appartamento TCA; the next generation of Appartamento with Temperature Control Adjustment. The Appartamento TCA is the evolution of our iconic Appartamento espresso machine with a modern aesthetic and features that take the Appartamento up a gear. The newly developed machine functions and improvements deliver an even better coffee experience in the home, raising the benchmark for performance in this category of premium domestic espresso machine. Rounded sides: The round contours give a whole new aesthetic to this perspective of the machine. The smooth curves draw the eye in, and a new vertical orientation for the Rocket logo. Focus on the holes: The distinctive circles on the machine sides have been accentuated with a debossing treatment, giving them a three-dimensional quality. The brewing group: A dynamic, purposeful shape, with a distinctive look.

title: Forme Living Sable Mug
description: Sable; /noun/ Sand The Sable Cup draws inspiration from the gentle sea foam caressing the sandy beaches. If you’ve ever longed for a moment of tranquility by the shore, this cup will transport you there with every sip. The Sable Cup is perfect for your morning Espresso or an afternoon Latte pick me up!

title: PPP Coffee x JOURN Everyday Tee - Samsui
description: A limited edition lifestyle collection in collaboration with two homegrown brands JOURN and PPP Coffee. An ode to the old and new - we pay tribute to the Samsui women of Singapore who were integral in building Singapore's infrastructure in the 1930s. As the saying goes, "Do not forget your roots". Our story reimagines our founding mothers nurturing and growing two intertwined cultures - coffee and cycling. May we never forget why we began. Using the same bespoke cotton-polyester blend developed for the brand, our Journ x PPP Coffee Samsui Everyday Tee unites both the old and the new by having an outer polyester layer to reminisce our old school PE days while keeping the oversized boxy fit of today's modern casual tees. An inner cotton layer also ensures that the tee is kept comfortable, breathable and stylish for both casual days and workout days. Fabric & Function: Boxy, oversized, straight-cut fit Male fit Main fabric weight: 180gsm Fabric: 55% Cotton / 45% Polyester Excels in warm-w

title: PWP: Classic Double Insulated Tumbler (10oz)
description: CHOOSE REUSE. THERE IS ONLY ONE PLANET EARTH. 'I like my coffee lukewarm.' says no one ever. Keep your coffee at its ideal drinking temperature with our double insulated tumbler. Its thick 304 stainless steel double walls will keep your coffee hot or cold for up to 6 hours. On the go? The lid screws tight, creating a leak-proof seal so you'll never have to worry about spills and mess. Bring your own reusable cup and enjoy S$1 off your takeaway drinks at participating cafe/retail outlets by PPP Coffee in Singapore. Product Specifications Material 304 Stainless Steel Capacity 300ml Size 85mm (D) x 170mm (H) Weight 151g

title: Ethiopia Suke Quto
description: Country/Region: Ethiopia/Guji Varietal: Welicho & Kurume Processing: Fully-Washed Elevation: 1850 - 2200 m.a.s.l. We Taste: Nectarine, White Florals, Citrus “I don’t consider myself to be a coffee farmer, because coffee is everything to me. All my time and energy are placed into the beans that I harvest and process.” Tesfaye Bekele, the founder of Suke Quto Farm, explains. Suke Quto has been one of our long-term coffee partners since 2014, and with each harvest we are reminded yet again of Tesfaye's story. Tesfaye Bekele is one of the people that put Guji coffee on the world map. Having worked in a government role to protect the environment and natural resources, he saw first-hand how large bushfires destroyed forests from 1997 to 1999. Tesfaye sought to rebuild the area, which was dominated by cattle farms. Having come from a coffee-producing family, he proposed the idea of replanting forest with coffee trees to enhance diversity. Distributing seedlings with a pickup truck, he was fac

description: A limited edition lifestyle collection in collaboration with two homegrown brands JOURN and PPP Coffee. An ode to the old and new - we pay tribute to the Samsui women of Singapore who were integral in building Singapore's infrastructure in the 1930s. As the saying goes, "Do not forget your roots". Our story reimagines our founding mothers nurturing and growing two intertwined cultures - coffee and cycling. May we never forget why we began. Using the same bespoke cotton-polyester blend developed for the brand, our Journ x PPP Coffee Samsui Everyday Tee unites both the old and the new by having an outer polyester layer to reminisce our old school PE days while keeping the oversized boxy fit of today's modern casual tees. An inner cotton layer also ensures that the tee is kept comfortable, breathable and stylish for both casual days and workout days. Fabric & Function: Boxy, oversized, straight-cut fit Male fit Main fabric weight: 180gsm Fabric: 55% Cotton / 45% Polyester Excels in warm-w

title: Ethiopia Suke Quto
description: Country/Region: Ethiopia/Guji Varietal: Welicho & Kurume Processing: Fully-Washed Elevation: 1850 - 2200 m.a.s.l. We Taste: Nectarine, White Florals, Citrus “I don’t consider myself to be a coffee farmer, because coffee is everything to me. All my time and energy are placed into the beans that I harvest and process.” Tesfaye Bekele, the founder of Suke Quto Farm, explains. Suke Quto has been one of our long-term coffee partners since 2014, and with each harvest we are reminded yet again of Tesfaye's story. Tesfaye Bekele is one of the people that put Guji coffee on the world map. Having worked in a government role to protect the environment and natural resources, he saw first-hand how large bushfires destroyed forests from 1997 to 1999. Tesfaye sought to rebuild the area, which was dominated by cattle farms. Having come from a coffee-producing family, he proposed the idea of replanting forest with coffee trees to enhance diversity. Distributing seedlings with a pickup truck, he was fac

title: MHW-3BOMBER - Racing M1 Manual Coffee Grinder (38mm Burr)
description: Using a six core stainless steel burr, this manual coffee grinder is stronger than most. The 38mm burr is sharp and efficient. It produces uniform grind size that is on par with the SCA Cupping Standard, and with minimal grind retention. Grind precisely from espresso to French press with the 24 numbers of coarseness adjustment. Clean the grinder easily with its three-stage detachable structure. Product Specifications Material SUS304, SUS420, Aluminium Alloy, Walnut, Maple Weight 500g Capacity 20g Dimensions 175W x 50D x 160H mm
