title: Supernova Pods - Decaf Subscription
description: Cafe-style coffee redesigned for the everyday drinker in Nespresso-compatible pods. Supernova was born out of an obsession and a dedication to make high quality coffees more accessible to the everyday coffee drinker. Wherever you might be, you can always enjoy a delicious tasting cup, with our high quality Nespresso-compatible pods. Now available in 100% aluminium. Decaf, not depressed. Using the Mountain Water decaffeination process, Decaf is organically-certified and 99.9% caffeine-free., with all the tasty goodness retained. Enjoy it black or with a dash of milk. Current Offering : Mexico Grapos* Decaffeination Method: Mountain Water Process Origin : Chiapas, Mexico Varietal : Typica, Marsellesa, Bourbon Processing : Fully-Washed Altitude : 700 - 1600 m.a.s.l. We Taste: Plums, Brown Sugar, Milk Chocolate *Please note that coffee offering may change or vary depending on availability. Please refer to the product page for the most up to date.

title: Supernova Drip Bag Gift Set
description: The perfect set for the burgeoning home barista looking to dip their toes into the world of filter coffee without the fancy gear. If you've ever wondered how drip coffee is made and want to try your hand at brewing a cup for yourself, this set is a great way to get acquainted with the basics of drip coffee. This set also serves as a viable option for the self-confessed coffee addict and/or travelling barista who can't live without their daily cuppa and just want a relatively fuss free way of brewing coffee while on their travels or camping trips. Just hang it over your favourite tumbler, pour, and enjoy! Each set includes: "Slowly But Surely" Mini Drip Kettle Choice of Supernova Drip Bag

title: The Morning Mini
description: The Morning Machine, Reimagined in Miniature Savor the rich, full-bodied flavors of specialty coffee with a refined design that fits effortlessly into any space. The MORNING Mini delivers the same uncompromised taste and brewing precision, now in a sleek, compact form—perfect for those who appreciate both quality and style. A Compact Design, Uncompromised Performance All the innovation and craftsmanship of the MORNING Machine, now distilled into a smaller, more refined form. The MORNING Mini boasts the same intuitive interface, easy MORNING app connectivity, and precision brewing technology—delivering an elevated coffee experience without sacrificing space. Effortless Control, Enhanced Connectivity The MORNING Mini introduces a sleek haptic slide bar, offering smooth navigation through five Ready-to-Brew options. title: Supernova Pods - Fusion Subscription
description: Cafe-style coffee redesigned for the everyday drinker in Nespresso-compatible pods. Supernova was born out of an obsession and a dedication to make high quality coffees more accessible to the everyday coffee drinker. Wherever you might be, you can always enjoy a delicious tasting cup, with our high quality Nespresso-compatible pods. Now available in 100% aluminium. Reminding us of a warm chocolate loaf topped with a generous blend of nuts, Fusion is perfect for the morning, or any time of the day, with milk or on its own. Current Composition: Brazil Rio Brilhante, India Thippanahalli Expect To Taste: Roasted Nuts, Caramel, Dark Chocolate *Please note that coffee beans used in composition may change or vary depending on availability. Please refer to the product page for the most up to date coffee.

title: Public Cupping @ Chye Seng Huat Hardware [15 June 2025]
description: Coffee cupping is an evaluation tool used by baristas and roasters to evaluate the coffees' quality and characteristics. If you've always been curious how we derived to the tasting notes of each coffee, j oin us for a public coffee cupping session on 15 June 2025! We'll be cupping 5 different types of coffees, from crowd's favourite to premium coffees from our latest range. Explore flavour profiles of the coffees, understand their origins, processing methods, and also roast levels. You also get a sneak peak of our roastery too! Slots are limited. Sign up now! Venue: Chye Seng Huat Hardware Address: 150 Tyrwhitt Road, S207563 Date: 15 June 2025 Time: 10.30am - 12pm Price: S$25 (S$10 return voucher that can be used in retail) All participants will receive a S$10 voucher that can be used in our retail stores at The Annex within CSHH, PPP Coffee Funan, PPP Coffee New Bahru. All sales are final. We do not accept change of date or offer refunds in the event of change of mind or no-show for t

title: Iron Tongue Singapore - Competitors
description: Think you've got what it takes to be crowned Singapore’s first Iron Tongue? Coffees around the world have distinctive taste characteristics depending on the country, region, and environmental factors they are grew in. Cup tasters can tell the difference just by taking a sip. Test your taste buds' speed, skill, and accuracy! You may just become Singapore's first Iron Tongue champion! Don’t say bojio! Venue: PPP Coffee @ New Bahru Address: 46 Kim Yam Rd, #01-06 New Bahru, Singapore 239351 Date: 11 September 2025 Time: 4pm - 10pm Each competitor will receive a set of Iron Tongue Singapore exclusive merchandise! Sign-ups closes 7 September 2025! All sales are final. We do not offer refunds in the event of change of mind or no-show for this event.

title: Public Cupping @ PPP Coffee New Bahru [20 July 2025]
description: Coffee cupping is an evaluation tool used by baristas and roasters to evaluate the coffees' quality and characteristics. We'll be cupping different types of coffees, from crowd's favourites to our latest premium range. Explore flavour profiles of the coffees, understand their origins, processing methods, and also roast levels. Slots are limited. Sign up now! Venue: PPP Coffee @ New Bahru Address: 46 Kim Yam Road, #01-06, New Bahru, S239351 Date: 20 July 2025, Sunday Time: 9.30am - 10.30am Price: $25 (S$10 return voucher that can be used in retail) All participants will receive a S$10 voucher that can be used in our retail stores at The Annex within CSHH, PPP Coffee Funan, PPP Coffee New Bahru. All sales are final. We do not accept change of date or offer refunds in the event of change of mind or no-show for this event.

title: 'Must Scrub' - PPP Coffee x Rough Beauty Bar Soap
description: Did you know that coffee grounds make an excellent natural exfoliant? ‘Must Scrub’ will leave your skin gently exfoliated with a lingering calming, sweet scent of lavender and fresh rosemary. Scent: Lavender and Rosemary Use: Wet soap bar with water and work up a lather with hands. Rub lather, or soap bar, onto skin directly. Rinse off after. Recommended for daily use. Keep soaps drained between uses. Ingredients: Saponified oils [coconut (Cocos nucifera), rice bran (Oryza sativa), sustainable palm (Elaeis guineensis) & castor (Ricinus communis)], essential oils (lavender, rosemary), coffee grounds Average weight: 110g

title: Supernova Drip Bags - Gaitania
description: Cafe-style coffee redesigned for the everyday drinker in single-serve drip bags. From blends to single origins, each one is roasted to perfection and crafted with excellence alongside 10 years of coffee roasting expertise - to deliver that unparalleled cafe experience in your cup. Gaitania, Colombia Country/Region : Colombia/ Tolima Varietal : Caturra, Typica Processing : Washed Elevation : 1700 - 1900 m.a.s.l. We Taste : Apricot, Nougat, Milk Chocolate Recommended Recipe: Pour 200ml of 92°C water over drip bag. Each box contains 9 drip bags.

title: Iron Tongue Singapore - Audience
description: Witness the crowning of Singapore's first Iron Tongue champion! Cheer on your friend or just come and join in the fun! Gather over food, drinks, and conversations while cheering on the competitors! Venue: PPP Coffee @ New Bahru Address: 46 Kim Yam Rd, #01-06 New Bahru, Singapore 239351 Date: 11 September 2025 Time: 4pm - 10pm Each ticket includes a complimentary drink, and a whole lot of fun! All sales are final. We do not offer refunds in the event of change of mind or no-show for this event.

title: Colombia Gaitania Subscription
description: Country/Region : Colombia/Tolima Varietal : Caturra, Typica Processing : Washed Elevation : 1700 - 1900 m.a.s.l. We Taste : Apricot, Nougat, Milk Chocolate Gaitania is located in the Planadas muncipality, in Tolima, Colombia. Known not only for its vibrant coffees, but also its deep cultural history, Planadas was once a place of refuge for political prisoners during Colombia's Liberal–Conservative conflict. Over time, reconciliation between both groups gave rise to the region’s lasting kindness to be known across the country. This coffee is produced by an indigenous community called Nasa Wesx, with roots across Cauca, Huila, and Tolima. With the support of local cooperatives ACEDGA and ASCISP, the Nasa Wesx people focus on sustainable farming, environmental conservation, and community-driven development. All their coffee is certified organic—a testament to their stewardship of the land. Harvested at altitudes between 1700–1900 metres, cherries are depulped and washed, then dried on rai

description: Tell the world you're part of Iron Tongue Singapore with a limited edition tote bag, specially designed and exclusively available for Iron Tongue Singapore only. Lightweight and spacious, use it to bag all the goodies you'll get from Iron Tongue Singapore or when you bring your own bag on your grocery run! Get yours while stocks last! Don't say bojio! Specification Material Cotton Canvas Weight 105g Dimensions Bag: 38cm (W), 44cm (L) Handle length: 32cm *Comes with 2 internal compartments

title: Ethiopia Worka Chelchele
description: Country/Region: Ethiopia/ Gedeb, Gedeo Varietal: Dega, Wolisho, Kurume, JARC 74110 Processing: Anaerobic Washed Elevation: 2000 - 2200 m.a.s.l. We Taste: Peach, Orange Blossom, Sencha Produced high in the hills of the Gedeb district, Worka Chelchele represents the dedication of nearly 400 smallholder farmers. Coffee here is intercropped with enset, beans, and tall shade trees, a biodiverse system that enriches both the land and the crop. Harvest mornings often begin with neighbors gathering together, singing as they carefully pick the ripest cherries—a rhythm of work and community passed down through generations. This same spirit carries into the washing station, where cherries are received and hand-sorted with care. The best lots are chosen for a special anaerobic fermentation process, where they are sealed in tanks for 36 to 48 hours before being pulped, washed in clean spring water, and laid to dry on raised beds. Traceability is deeply valued here, with drying batches marked with t

Harvest mornings often begin with neighbors gathering together, singing as they carefully pick the ripest cherries—a rhythm of work and community passed down through generations. This same spirit carries into the washing station, where cherries are received and hand-sorted with care. The best lots are chosen for a special anaerobic fermentation process, where they are sealed in tanks for 36 to 48 hours before being pulped, washed in clean spring water, and laid to dry on raised beds. Traceability is deeply valued here, with drying batches marked with t

description: Cafe-Standard Milk At Home The MORNING Dream brings café-quality milk to your home with effortless precision. Discover unmatched smoothness and creamy perfection in every pour - turning your daily routine into a moment of simple luxury. title: Public Cupping @ PPP Coffee Funan [ 17 August 2025]
description: Coffee cupping is an evaluation tool used by baristas and roasters to evaluate the coffees' quality and characteristics. If you've always been curious how we derived to the tasting notes of each coffee, j oin us for a public coffee cupping session on 17 August 2025! We'll be cupping different types of coffees, from crowd's favourites to our latest premium range. Explore flavour profiles of the coffees, understand their origins, processing methods, and also roast levels. Slots are limited. Sign up now! Venue: PPP Coffee @ Funan Address: 107 North Bridge Rd, #02-19, S179105 Date: 17 August 2025, Sunday Time: 10.30am - 11.30am Price: $25 (S$10 return voucher that can be used in retail) All participants will receive a S$10 voucher that can be used in our retail stores at The Annex within CSHH, PPP Coffee Funan, PPP Coffee New Bahru. All sales are final. We do not accept change of date or offer refunds in the event of change of mind or no-show for this event.

title: Supernova Drip Bags - Arufa
description: Cafe-style coffee redesigned for the everyday drinker in single-serve drip bags. From blends to single origins, each one is roasted to perfection and crafted with excellence alongside 10 years of coffee roasting expertise - to deliver that unparalleled cafe experience in your cup. Arufa, Papua New Guinea Country/Region : Papua New Guinea, Jiwaka Varietal : Typica, Bourbon Processing : Natural Elevation : 1653 m.a.s.l. We Taste : Cherry, Raisin, Dark Chocolate Recommended Recipe: Pour 200ml of 92°C water over drip bag. Each box contains 9 drip bags.

title: Colombia Gaitania
description: Country/Region : Colombia/Tolima Varietal : Caturra, Typica Processing : Washed Elevation : 1700 - 1900 m.a.s.l. We Taste : Apricot, Nougat, Milk Chocolate Gaitania is located in the Planadas muncipality, in Tolima, Colombia. Known not only for its vibrant coffees, but also its deep cultural history, Planadas was once a place of refuge for political prisoners during Colombia's Liberal–Conservative conflict. Over time, reconciliation between both groups gave rise to the region’s lasting kindness to be known across the country. This coffee is produced by an indigenous community called Nasa Wesx, with roots across Cauca, Huila, and Tolima. With the support of local cooperatives ACEDGA and ASCISP, the Nasa Wesx people focus on sustainable farming, environmental conservation, and community-driven development. All their coffee is certified organic—a testament to their stewardship of the land. Harvested at altitudes between 1700–1900 metres, cherries are depulped and washed, then dried on rai
